Slayer laughs, approaching Turkey and then getting more serious. "Allright, where's the crate supposed to be? We're at the general area."

> "Very funny ya dumb dog." Ignatius yelled without thinking. He quickly

> He regained his composure and only spoke two words, "I'm sorry"
